channel.title: Henry Rollins - KCRW
channel.description: Henry Rollins hosts a great mix of all kinds from all over from all time.

item.title: KCRW Broadcast 825
item.description: Fanatic! I hope you had a great week and had a chance to listen to some music.

item.title: KCRW Broadcast 824
item.description: Fanatic. I hope you had a good week. Hopefully the winds that have been feeding the fires in Southern California are pulling back and allowing firefighting personnel to make advances against the flames.

item.title: KCRW Broadcast 822
item.description: Fanatic. I hope no matter where you are that you’re safe and in good condition. I can’t explain how sorry I am for what has been lost. We hope you enjoy tonight’s gathering of tracks. Thank you so much for tuning in. Be safe and stay Fanatic.

item.title: KCRW Broadcast 821
item.description: Fanatic! It’s our last show for the year. Engineer X, Engineer Am-Rock and I would like to thank you so much for tuning in. We hope we kept things interesting and that you will stay with us as we go fanatically into 2025.

item.title: KCRW Broadcast 820
item.description: Fanatic! I hope you had a great week and had a chance to listen to some music.
